preparation.title: Interview preparation
preparation.noActiveTitle: Explore a new profession and become part of our friendly team, interview and improve your knowledge in practice.
preparation.noActiveDescription: With us you can learn a new IT profession that will allow you to become part of our large community and find your dream profession, with us you can fully immerse yourself in the profession and become a full-fledged specialist.
preparation.stubDescription: You have not selected the major you want to study, go to your profile and fill it out to start preparing for interviews

questions.title: Questions list
questions.empty: Questions for the selected specialization will appear soon

toast.questionIsNotLearned: Failed to fully learn the question
toast.progressIsReset: The question learning progress has been reset
toast.progressIsNotReset: Failed to reset the question learning progress

history_preparation.title: Interview history
history_preparation.empty: Your interview history will appear here soon
history_preparation.unverified: Your interview history is prepared after email confirmation
